TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 擷取並提出關於 Web 要求的執行詳細資料。

span.span: Captures and presents execution details about a Web request.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將訊息附加到特定追蹤類別，您可以使用這個類別。You can use this class to append messages to specific trace categories. 例如，如果您要建立的執行個體類別應用程式，您可能包含 」 開始以呈現"的追蹤訊息中的轉譯程序和 「 引發 OnChange 事件 」 事件處理常式的程序中。For example, if you are creating an instance of the class for your application, you might include the trace message "Starting To Render" in a rendering procedure, and "Raising OnChange Event" in an event handler procedure. 您也可以使用類別來取得一組自訂處理的要求執行結尾的追蹤記錄。You can also use the class to obtain a set of trace records at the end of request execution for custom processing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). 若要啟用追蹤時，設定`Trace`屬性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞或屬性`true`。To enable tracing, set the `Trace` attribute in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or the property to `true`. 當啟用追蹤時，除了顯示使用者所提供的追蹤內容類別會自動包含效能資料、 控制樹狀結構資訊和狀態管理內容為每個要求。When tracing is enabled, in addition to showing user-provided trace content, the class automatically includes performance data, control-tree structure information, and state management content for every request.

MemberSignature.Value: public TraceContext (System.Web.HttpContext context);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed
Public Sub New (context As HttpContext)
public: TraceContext(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context);

param.span: ，包含關於目前 Web 要求的資訊。

span.span: An that contains information about the current Web request.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsEnabled
Public Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否已針對目前的 Web 要求啟用追蹤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the current Web request.

value.span: 如果已啟用追蹤，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if tracing is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個旗標來檢查是否網頁或應用程式應該要輸出追蹤資訊之前它會寫入任何項目追蹤記錄檔。Use this flag to check whether your page or application should output tracing information before it writes anything to the trace log. 值屬性而定的小節中的設定`system.web`組態區段，而`trace`指示詞的屬性。The value of the property depends on the settings in the subsection of the `system.web` configuration section and the value of the `trace` attribute of the directive. 在頁面指示詞中設定的追蹤選項優先於組態檔中設定的選項。The tracing option set in the page directive takes precedence over the option set in the configuration file. 設定值以程式設計的方式會優先於頁面指示詞屬性和組態設定。Setting the value programmatically takes precedence over both the page directive attribute and the configuration setting. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性`true`整個應用程式，您必須明確設定此屬性為`false`不想顯示的追蹤資訊的應用程式中的任何頁面。If you set the property to `true` for an entire application, you must explicitly set this property to `false` for any page in the application for which you do not want tracing information displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷頁面是否已啟用追蹤。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether tracing is enabled for a page. 程式碼會逐一資料集，在該資料集寫入每個資料列的追蹤陳述式中的資料列。The code iterates through the rows in a dataset, writing trace statements for each row in that dataset. [!code-csharp[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler TraceFinished;
.event class System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler TraceFinished
Public Custom Event TraceFinished As TraceContextEventHandler
public: event System::Web::TraceContextEventHandler ^ TraceFinished;

summary.span: 由 物件所引發，在收集所有要求資訊之後公開追蹤訊息。

span.span: Raised by the object to expose trace messages after all request information is gathered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間引發事件`EndRequest`HTTP 要求處理的階段。The event is raised during the `EndRequest` stage of HTTP request processing. 會引發此事件由物件之後會收集的所有要求資訊，來公開 （expose） 的集合訊息，以註冊委派。It is raised by a object after all request information is gathered, to expose the collection of messages to registered delegates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範您可以註冊處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a to handle the event. 在此範例中，委派逐一查看的追蹤訊息並將它們寫入回應資料流。不過，您可以撰寫相同的資訊到資料庫或程式碼剖析工具取用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them to the response stream; however, you could write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.TraceMode TraceMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.TraceMode TraceMode
Public Property TraceMode As TraceMode
public: property System::Web::TraceMode TraceMode { System::Web::TraceMode get(); void set(System::Web::TraceMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定已排序的順序，追蹤訊息依此順序輸出至提出要求的瀏覽器。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorted order in which trace messages should be output to a requesting browser.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 預設值為組態檔的 區段中 屬性所指定的設定 (此組態檔的預設值為 )。

span.span: The default is the setting specified by the attribute in the section of a configuration file, whose default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已處理的順序或依字母順序是由使用者定義的分類，您可以排序追蹤訊息。Trace messages can be sorted in the order they were processed, or alphabetically by user-defined category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何網頁的追蹤陳述式依字母順序來排序您已指派給陳述式的類別。The following code example demonstrates how you can sort a page's trace statements alphabetically by the categories that you have assigned to the statements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入檢測檔。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log.

summary.span: 不像 ，所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: Unlike , all warnings appear in the log as red text.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Warn (string message);
.method public hidebysig instance void Warn(string message) cil managed
Public Sub Warn (message As String)
public: void Warn(System::String ^ message);

param.name: message
param.span: 要寫入記錄檔的追蹤訊息。

span.span: The trace message to write to the log.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入檢測檔。

span.span: Writes a trace message to the trace log.

summary.span: 所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，其處理時事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 與加入訊息其屬性設定為`true`及其屬性設定為`null`。The message is added with its property set to `true` and its property set to `null`.

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，其處理時事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 與加入訊息其屬性設定為`true`及其屬性設定為`null`。The message is added with its property set to `true` and its property set to `null`.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入追蹤記錄檔，包括任何使用者定義的分類、追蹤訊息和錯誤資訊。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories, trace messages, and error information.

summary.span: 所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，其處理時事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 與加入訊息其屬性設定為`true`，而屬性設定為傳遞的物件`errorInfo`參數。The message is added with its property set to `true`, and the property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，將錯誤追蹤訊息寫入追蹤記錄檔。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此範例中，不同的例外狀況會視為錯誤和警告追蹤。In this example, different exceptions are traced as errors and warnings. 頁面會擲回，它會將警告訊息，使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes a warning message using the method. 頁面會擲回，它會將錯誤訊息使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes an error message using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，其處理時事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 與加入訊息其屬性設定為`false`及其屬性設定為`null`。The message is added with its property set to `false` and its property set to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，將錯誤追蹤訊息寫入追蹤記錄檔。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此範例中，委派逐一查看的追蹤訊息，並將其作為一個 HTML 資料表;不過，您可以撰寫相同的資訊到資料庫或程式碼剖析工具取用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them as an HTML table; however, you can write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer.
